Job Title: UX Product Designer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
UX Product Designer Join AF Group as part of the newly minted UX team. You’ll be partnering with product, engineering, stakeholders (internal and external), and others to work on a variety of applications that support our wide array of users. You’ll champion the UX perspective and be an advocate for all users while sensitive to the business needs and goals. Responsibilities

Identify user needs and demonstrate how design decisions support themGather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product and engineeringConfidently explain and rationale your design decisions to stakeholdersDesign successful, user-focused solutions that balance business objectives and user needs and meet accessibility standardsIdentify user needs and demonstrate how design decisions support themDesigning visual assets (e.g., buttons, modules, micro animations, etc.)Building out visual assets for our design library and collaborating with engineering on their component library RequirementsStrong understanding of interaction designA passion for solving problems via elegant & clean designsExperience in creating a wide range of UI elements from logos to iconsExcellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interactionExpertise in CS SuitePossess excellent interpersonal skills with an enthusiastic, energetic approach to your workAbility to build and maintain strong working relationships with team members, stakeholders, and usersAbility to present/report your solutions in engaging waysFamiliar with Figma, Zeplin, and other product design toolsA commitment to creating pixel-perfect visual comps paired with detailed interaction specifications that developers can turn into codeKnowledgeable about agile/lean UX environmentA portfolio (online or in document form) that speaks to your UX Visual Design experience & skills A typical day may consist of... Meeting with team members to discuss requirements, performing discovery work, designing UI components, creating wireframes and production-ready visual comps designs, presenting work, your thought process, and more

Indigo Slate is a full-service human experience company. We are a digital organization backed by a global engineering leader, and we’re dedicated to helping clients build transformative experiences from start to finish. We create smart experiences that deliver powerful results through a profound intersection of marketing, technology, business, and creative. We understand that brands are no longer judged through their advertising, but through each touchpoint, both internal and external, building strength with every experience.

At Indigo Slate, we harness a mix of skills unique in our industry—equal parts strategic consultancy, creative agency, and technology thought leadership—to build and run some of the best experiences on the planet.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
